Song.title: I Will Rise
Song.copyright: Â© 2008 Vamos Publishing | worshiptogether.com songs | sixsteps Music | Thankyou Music | Chris Tomlin | Jesse Reeves | Louie Giglio | Matt Maher

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: There's a [C#m9]peace I've come to k[A]now Though my h[E]eart and flesh may f[B5]ail There's an [C#m9]anchor for my s[A]oul I can s[E]ay it is w[B]ell
Pre-Chorus: J[E]esus has over[B/D#]come And the [C#m7]grave is overwh[A2]elmed The v[E/G#]ictory is [Bsus]won [B] He is [C#m9]risen from the d[A2]ead
Chorus: (And) I will r[E2]ise when He [B(4)]calls my name [C#m9]No more sorrow [A2]no more pain I will r[E2]ise on e[B(4)]agle's wings Be[C#m9]fore my God fall [A2]on my knees and r[E2]ise [A2] I will [E/B]rise [B]
{new_page} Verse 2: There's a [C#m9]day that's drawing n[A2]ear When this d[Emaj7]arkness breaks to [B(4)]light And the sh[C#m9]adows disapp[A2]ear And my [Emaj7]faith shall be my [B(4)]eyes
Chorus: (And) I will r[E2]ise when He [B(4)]calls my name [C#m9]No more sorrow [A2]no more pain I will r[E2]ise on e[B(4)]agle's wings Be[C#m9]fore my God fall [A2]on my knees and r[E2]ise [A2] I will [E/B]rise [B]
Bridge: And I hear the v[A2]oice of m[E]any an[B]gels sing W[A2]orthy [E]is the L[B]amb And I hear the [A2]cry of [E]ev'ry l[B]onging [C#m7]heart W[A2]orthy [E]is the L[B]amb [REPEAT] W[A2]orthy [E]is the L[B]amb [E2 | B(4) | C#m7 | A2 |]
Ending: I will [E/B]rise [A2/C#] I will [E/B]rise [B(4) E]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 theres a peace ive come to know though my heart and flesh may fail theres an anchor for my soul i can say it is well prechorus jesus has overcome and the grave is overwhelmed the victory is won he is risen from the dead chorus and i will rise when he calls my name no more sorrow no more pain i will rise on eagles wings before my god fall on my knees and rise i will rise verse 2 theres a day thats drawing near when this darkness breaks to light and the shadows disappear and my faith shall be my eyes chorus and i will rise when he calls my name no more sorrow no more pain i will rise on eagles wings before my god fall on my knees and rise i will rise bridge and i hear the voice of many angels sing worthy is the lamb and i hear the cry of evry longing heart worthy is the lamb worthy is the lamb ending i will rise i will rise
